translation.en: ♪ Koa-la-la ♪
[Izzy] It's one of my favorite times of the year on the island.
translation.it: È uno dei miei momenti preferiti dell'anno, sull'isola.

translation.en: It's baby koala season!
translation.it: È la stagione dei cuccioli di koala!

translation.en: Lots of little koala babies
have been hanging out with their mums in the trees.
translation.it: stanno con le loro mamme sugli alberi.

translation.en: But because it's been so hot and dry, koalas need our help now more than ever.
translation.it: Ma il tempo è caldo e secco e perciò hanno bisogno del nostro aiuto.

translation.en: It's okay. You're safe with us now.
translation.it: Va tutto bene. Con noi sei al sicuro.

translation.en: Mum, Dad, and I have been rescuing lots of koalas
translation.it: Io, mamma e papà abbiamo salvato molti koala

translation.en: and bringing them home to our koala hospital…
translation.it: e li abbiamo portati nel nostro ospedale dei koala.

translation.en: …where we treat them
and release them back into the wild when they're ready.
translation.it: e li liberiamo quando sono pronti.

translation.en: There's the tree!
This is your new home.
-[Ali] Whoa! -[Izzy] Have fun!
That's it, sweet!
-Bye, Juliet! -[Tim] Bye, Juliet! See ya!
[Izzy] Right now, we've got StormBoy,
Muffin and Cinderella,
and lots and lots of babies!
Chompy, come back!
Teddy, where are you going?
This is the koala nursery.
translation.it: Questo è il nido dei koala.

translation.en: And we have four baby koalas that we're caring for at the moment.
translation.it: Adesso ci stiamo occupando di quattro cuccioli di koala.

translation.en: They all lost their mums.
So they need each other to learn from and to get koala cuddles.
translation.it: Quindi hanno bisogno l'uno dell'altro per imparare e coccolarsi.

translation.en: This is Chompy.
He went from being our smallest baby to our biggest baby.
translation.it: Prima era il cucciolo più piccolo e ora è il più grande.

translation.en: He's the boss.
This is Teddy.
He's one of the shier babies.
translation.it: È uno dei cuccioli più timidi.

translation.en: This is Pumpkin. [chuckles]
She's our tiniest baby.
translation.it: È il nostro cucciolo più piccolo.

translation.en: She's small, but she's feisty.
Twinkle.
Do you have yourself a Pumpkin?
Twinkle's really patient
and she acts like a mum to the other babies.
translation.it: e fa da mamma agli altri cuccioli.

translation.en: We are very, very busy at the moment.
translation.it: Siamo molto impegnati in questo momento.

translation.en: Um… Excuse me, Chompy!
[Ali] Four babies of this size is the most that we've ever had.
translation.it: Non abbiamo mai avuto quattro cuccioli così grandi.

translation.en: Having youngsters in care is always...
translation.it: Avere dei cuccioli in affidamento è sempre…

translation.en: always takes a lot more time because we have to feed them milk.
translation.it: Ci vuole più tempo, perché dobbiamo dargli il latte.

translation.en: We've got to make sure they've got the freshest leaf.
translation.it: Dobbiamo assicurarci che mangino le foglie più fresche.

translation.en: We have to work as a team to make sure that everything is done,
translation.it: Dobbiamo fare lavoro di squadra per riuscire a fare tutto

translation.en: and we just need to make sure we're doing the right thing.
translation.it: e assicurarci di farlo per bene.

translation.en: Oh my goodness!
What is going on here?
It's a koala party.
Hello, babies!
What a whole bundle of trouble.
translation.it: Siete proprio una banda di monelli.

translation.en: -Here, Iz, I'll give you the milk. -[Izzy] I'll do Twinkle.
translation.it: - Iz, il latte. - Penso io a Scintilla.

translation.en: Okay, I will do Teddy.
translation.it: Ok, io mi occupo di Teddy.

translation.en: Oh my goodness! Come on!
-Here it is. -Pumpkin, can I please borrow Twinkle?
translation.it: - Ecco qui. - Zucca, mi presti Scintilla?

translation.en: I won't be long. I promise.
Why don't you go annoy Chompy?
[Ali] Oh! Go and annoy Chompy.
Oh! You little monkey!
[Izzy] I have to go kind of fast with Twinkle because she laps it.
translation.it: Devo fare presto con Scintilla, perché lo beve subito.

translation.en: Excuse me, Chompy, where are you taking Pumpkin?
Don't forget you have Pumpkin on your back
and you're squishing her!
Chompy, you are so naughty!
This year, baby season, it's gone very, very dry and very hot.
translation.it: Quest'anno, la stagione dei cuccioli è molto secca e calda.

translation.en: [Ali] In the wild, the babies,
normally they'd be clinging on to Mum all the time.
But being in the full force of the sun,
translation.it: Ma stando sotto il sole cocente,

translation.en: mums are getting really exhausted and sometimes the babies get lost.
translation.it: le mamme si stancano e a volte i cuccioli si perdono.

translation.en: That's when we need to help them.
We've got our hands full at the moment.
I'm not really sure we could handle any more than this.
[Izzy] Oh! We've had a Pumpkin down!
I think everybody's ready for a nap.
translation.it: Sono tutti pronti per un pisolino.

translation.en: -Should we get them back to bed? -Yeah.
Good night, Teddy. Good night, Twinkle.
Good night, Pumpkin and Chompy.
Sleep well!
-[Ali] Hey, Izzy! -[Izzy] Yeah?
We've had a call about a baby koala.
translation.it: Ci hanno chiamato per un cucciolo.

translation.en: Oh, okay!
-[Ali] Go! -[Izzy] All right. Stay there, Loki!
translation.it: - Vai. - Va bene. Resta lì, Loki!

translation.en: [Ali] It's so hot out there that we need to get cracking.
translation.it: Fa caldissimo, là fuori. Dobbiamo fare in fretta.

translation.en: -[Izzy] Where's the koala? -[Ali] We think he's near the Sphinx.
translation.it: - Dov'è il koala? - Vicino allo Sphinx, credo.

translation.en: [Izzy] That's a really long hike. We've got to hurry.
[Ali] And the little baby is still separated from the mum
translation.it: E il cucciolo è stato separato dalla mamma

translation.en: in the middle of the heat.
He's not safe where he is.
We can't really leave him there any longer.
[Ali] It's way too small to survive on its own.
translation.it: È troppo piccolo per sopravvivere da solo.

translation.en: Let's go.
It's a long walk. It's at least two and a half kilometers.
translation.it: È una lunga camminata. Sono almeno due chilometri e mezzo.

translation.en: -[Tim sighs] -[Izzy] It's really dry.
-[Tim] It is dry, isn't it? -[Ali] It's so dry.
[Izzy] Is the lady who found him still with the baby?
translation.it: La signora che l'ha trovato è con lui?

translation.en: [Ali] Yeah, they're waiting for us.
It's been now away from his mum for most of the day
translation.it: Non è stato con la mamma per quasi tutto il giorno

translation.en: and it's really stinking hot, so he's going to need a drink.
translation.it: e fa davvero molto caldo, perciò avrà tanta sete.

translation.en: We're almost there.
-Hey! -[Izzy] Hi!
[Tim] He's over here.
[Izzy] It's tiny!
[Tim] Oh, yeah.
-[woman] Thanks ever so much, ladies. -[Izzy] Thank you!
[woman] All right. Oh. No worries.
[Izzy] Hi! It's okay.
He should definitely still be with the mum.
translation.it: Dovrebbe stare ancora con la mamma.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, definitely. He's so tiny.
[Izzy] He's smaller than any of the other babies we have at home.
translation.it: È più piccolo di tutti quelli che abbiamo a casa.

translation.en: It's okay.
[Ali] Just cuddle him. That's it.
-I've got you. -[Ali] That's it.
There you go.
I think we really need to race him home now
and go and get some milk into him.
Do you want my hat, Iz, to keep him in the shade?
translation.it: Vuoi il cappello per tenerlo all'ombra?

translation.en: -[Izzy] Yes, please. -[Ali] You could put my hat over.
[Izzy] He's grabbing on to me pretty tight.
That's a really good sign.
[Ali] Yeah. I think he must be trusting you now.
translation.it: Sì. Credo che ora si fidi di te.

translation.en: [Tim] Let's get this baby home.
[Izzy] I think he's really dehydrated because it's so dry and hot.
translation.it: Credo che sia molto disidratato perché il tempo è caldo e secco.

translation.en: [Izzy] This one really needs milk.
[Ali] All right, Iz, I'll get him some milk.
translation.it: Bene, Iz, gli prendo del latte.

translation.en: This one's so tiny and it was just so very hot up there.
translation.it: Questo koala è piccolissimo e lassù faceva molto caldo.

translation.en: He needs milk.
If I can't get him to take milk, I don't know how he's going to go.
translation.it: Se non riesco a farglielo prendere, non so come finirà.

translation.en: Shall we?
[Izzy] It's all right.
Mum's a wildlife vet. She's gonna give you some milk.
translation.it: Mamma è una veterinaria. Ti darà un po' di latte.

translation.en: I know it's all strange, baby. It's very different.
translation.it: So che è tutto strano, piccolo. È molto diverso.

translation.en: [Izzy] You can do this.
This is gonna help you feel better.
[Ali whispers] It's okay.
[Izzy] Good boy!
[Ali chuckles] That's pretty amazing. That's pretty quick going.
[Izzy] Aw, look at his little tongue.
What a smart little boy.
[Izzy] That milk is so good for you.
translation.it: Quel latte ti fa molto bene.

translation.en: I'm thinking of names.
He's so brave.
-[Ali] Mm. -[Izzy] He's strong.
What about Ranger?
[Ali] I think that would suit him,
-surviving out in the wild by himself. -Yeah!
translation.it: - È sopravvissuto là fuori da solo. - Sì!

translation.en: Mm, that's a good name.
This is the most koala babies that we've had in at one time.
translation.it: Non abbiamo mai avuto così tanti koala tutti insieme.

translation.en: Now we're up to five.
Maybe we can start to slowly introduce him to some others.
translation.it: Potremo iniziare a presentarlo agli altri gradualmente.

translation.en: Maybe Twinkle?
Because she's really calm and she sort of always acts like a mum.
translation.it: Lei è molto calma e si comporta sempre come una mamma.

translation.en: I think it'll help Ranger to have Twinkle to cuddle.
translation.it: Credo che a Ranger farà bene avere Scintilla con cui coccolarsi.

translation.en: I think you're right, but right now he's very scared and fragile.
translation.it: Hai ragione, ma ora è molto spaventato e fragile.

translation.en: Until he's stronger and more confident,
translation.it: Dev'essere più forte e sicuro di sé,

translation.en: he's not ready to meet Twinkle or any of the other babies.
translation.it: o non sarà pronto a conoscere Scintilla e gli altri.

translation.en: It all just depends on the type of night that he's had.
translation.it: Dipende tutto da come passa la notte.

translation.en: -[Ali] If he just settles… -[Izzy] Mm-hm.
…and he's calm and quiet and has a good sleep,
translation.it: è tranquillo e si fa una bella dormita,

translation.en: then maybe think about meeting somebody else.
Yeah. We'll let him sleep
and then we'll check on him in the morning?
[Izzy] Good morning, Ranger.
How are you?
-How is he doing, Iz? -Good.
-You want to try giving him a gentle feed? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Vuoi provare a dargli da mangiare? - Sì.

translation.en: [Ali] Okay, here you go.
[Izzy] Good boy, Ranger.
He looks so much better this morning.
-He's a messy eater. -[Ali] I know.
translation.it: - Quando mangia, si sbrodola. - Lo so.

translation.en: A lot of it is dripping down his chin.
[Izzy] He's taking his milk really well.
He slept really well last night.
I really want to introduce him to the other koalas.
Twinkle, especially.
I think the more, like, warmth and cuddles
translation.it: Credo che con il calore e le coccole

translation.en: that Twinkle can give him,
the more confident, less nervous,
translation.it: diventerà più sicuro e meno nervoso

translation.en: and the more safe he feels here, it will help him recover faster.
translation.it: e sentendosi più protetto si riprenderà più velocemente.

translation.en: I'm not sure that this little boy is at that point yet.
translation.it: Secondo me, non è ancora pronto.

translation.en: A baby as small as Ranger can take up to a week
translation.it: Un cucciolo come Ranger può metterci una settimana

translation.en: before he might come out of his shell enough
to want to meet anybody else.
We just got to take it day by day.
[Izzy] I have an idea, Mum.
If I put him down
and maybe if I put the toy koala in front of him
translation.it: gli metto il peluche di koala davanti

translation.en: and Ranger's cuddling onto the toy koala,
translation.it: e Ranger si coccola col peluche,

translation.en: maybe it's a sign that we can introduce him.
translation.it: forse significa che può conoscere gli altri.

translation.en: It'll let Ranger show us when he's ready.
translation.it: Ci farà capire quando è pronto.

translation.en: [Ali] Yeah, that's possible.
Ranger, you have to show me that you're confident enough
translation.it: Ranger, vediamo se sei abbastanza sicuro di te

translation.en: to walk over to the toy koala
so that you'll be able to meet a real-life koala like Twinkle.
translation.it: così potrai conoscere un koala vero come Scintilla.

translation.en: I think meeting Twinkle will help you feel happier.
translation.it: Credo che incontrare Scintilla ti farà sentire più felice.

translation.en: You won't be as lonely.
Come on, Ranger. You can do this.
You can tell that he's still quite scared.
translation.it: Si vede che ha ancora paura.

translation.en: He's not exploring.
He's not curious enough yet.
It doesn't matter how slow we go.
I'll just make sure that you feel comfortable.
translation.it: Farò in modo che tu ti senta a tuo agio.

translation.en: We'll try again tomorrow.
[Izzy] Ranger, look!
It's good that you're exploring.
translation.it: È bello che tu stia esplorando.

translation.en: Do you think that you can climb up on this toy koala, Ranger?
translation.it: Pensi di poterti arrampicare su questo peluche, Ranger?

translation.en: [whispers] Wrong way.
We'll try again tomorrow.
Are you ready today, Ranger?
You can do this.
Ranger, you're getting more curious.
If you keep this up, you'll be able to meet Twinkle soon.
translation.it: Se continui così, presto incontrerai Scintilla.

translation.en: We'll try again tomorrow.
[Izzy] Come on, Ranger. I know you can do it.
translation.it: Su, Ranger. So che puoi farcela.

translation.en: I need to see that you're confident enough to meet Twinkle.
translation.it: Devi essere abbastanza sicuro di te per conoscere Scintilla.

translation.en: Keep going, Ranger. You're so close.
translation.it: Continua così, Ranger. Ci sei quasi.

translation.en: You can do this.
Good job, Ranger.
That's so good.
I'm so proud of you.
He's definitely happier. He's more confident.
translation.it: È decisamente più felice. È più sicuro di sé.

translation.en: He went from being really curled up and small and sad
translation.it: È passato dall'essere rannicchiato, piccolo e triste

translation.en: to running over and jumping up
onto something that he feels comfortable with.
translation.it: su qualcosa con cui si sente a suo agio.

translation.en: So, these are great signs that he's ready to meet Twinkle.
translation.it: Sono segnali che ci dicono che è pronto a conoscere Scintilla.

translation.en: That was adorable. [chuckles]
Let's introduce you to Twinkle.
Are you excited, Ranger?
You're gonna meet Twinkle today.
[Ali] Hey, little Twinkle.
How you going, baby girl?
You wanna go and meet Ranger?
I think Twinkle's the perfect koala baby for you to meet.
translation.it: Credo che Scintilla sia il koala perfetto per te.

translation.en: [Ali] Come on.
She's kind, she's caring,
and she knows how you feel.
Hello!
Hello! Look who I've got.
-[Izzy] Hi! -[Ali] Shh.
[Izzy] Ranger, meet Twinkle.
Twinkle, meet Ranger.
Ranger's very excited to see you.
translation.it: Ranger è molto felice di vederti.

translation.en: He's been waiting so long.
Twinkle, you need to be a really caring big sister to him
translation.it: Scintilla, devi fargli da sorella maggiore

translation.en: 'cause he's really scared.
Are you two just checking each other out by smelling each other?
translation.it: Vi state conoscendo annusandovi a vicenda?

translation.en: -Maybe we can pop him next to Twinkle. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Possiamo metterlo vicino a Scintilla. - Sì.

translation.en: [Ali whispers] Slowly, slowly. Yes.
That's it.
[Izzy] Aw, good job, Ranger.
Twinkle's incredibly patient.
[Ali] She really is such a sweet girl.
Thank you, Twinkle, for looking after him.
translation.it: Grazie di prenderti cura di lui.

translation.en: I think they're a pretty good match. Yeah?
I think that's the face of contentment from Ranger.
Just the fact that he can now cuddle somebody else.
This is really going to help Ranger with his recovery,
just like it has done for the other babies.
translation.it: così come hanno fatto gli altri cuccioli.

translation.en: He's so comfortable that he's fallen asleep.
translation.it: È così a suo agio che si sta addormentando.

translation.en: That's exactly what he would do with his mum in the wild.
translation.it: È quello che farebbe con sua madre in natura.

translation.en: Yeah, he would. Just goes to show how important koala cuddles are.
translation.it: Sì. Dimostra quanto sono importanti le coccole di un koala.

translation.en: [Izzy] This is the sign of a happy koala.
translation.it: Questo ci dimostra che è un koala felice.

translation.en: In this episode, you saw me and my family helping wild animals.
translation.it: In quest'episodio, io e la mia famiglia abbiamo aiutato animali selvatici.

translation.en: If you see an animal that you think might be sick or injured,
translation.it: Se vedi un animale che pensi sia malato o ferito,

translation.en: don't approach it, tell an adult,
and ask them to call a trained professional.
translation.it: e chiedigli di contattare un professionista.
